oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tools and innovations in mechanical weed control in north-western Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: van der Weide, Rommie
Riemens, Marleen
Ascard, Johan
Melander, Bo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper describes the major achievements made in European research regaridng physical methods for weed control in agricultural and horticultural crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: van der Weide, Rommie; Riemens, Marleen; Ascard, Johan and Melander, Bo (2011) Tools and innovations in mechanical weed control in north-western Europe. In: Topics in Canadian Weed Science, 6, Physical weed control: Progress and challenges, pp. 89-102.
